description: VMAlertRemoteWriteSpec defines the remote storage configuration for VmAlert

bearerTokenSecret.description: Optional bearer auth token to use for -remoteWrite.url

concurrency.description: Defines number of readers that concurrently write into remote storage (default 1)

flushInterval.description: Defines interval of flushes to remote write endpoint (default 5s)

headers.description: Headers allow configuring custom http headers Must be in form of semicolon separated header with value e.g. headerName:headerValue vmalert supports it since 1.79.0 version

maxBatchSize.description: Defines defines max number of timeseries to be flushed at once (default 1000)

maxQueueSize.description: Defines the max number of pending datapoints to remote write endpoint (default 100000)

url.description: URL of the endpoint to send samples to.
